item.title: By: ArclighZ
item.dc:creator: ArclighZ
item.description:
The fact that you spotted him is probably the only reason the pilot found him. Something is wrong with view distance in this game, light vehicles like Puma/Greyhounds are invisible from the air in the third person. You have to swap to first-person zoom scope for them to suddenly pop out, and they vanish again the instant you zoom out and ready your bombsight.
Most pilots I speak to has this issue, so I am pretty sure its not just me.
